results.title: Statin modulation of monocyte phenotype and function: implications for HIV-1-associated neurocognitive disorders.
results.text_hl: Finally, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibited production of @GENE_CCL2 @GENE_6347 @@@monocyte chemoattractant protein-1@@@ (MCP-1) and other @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ cytokines following @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@ stimulation and reduced monocyte chemotaxis in response to MCP-1, a major driver of myeloid cell accumulation in the CNS in @<m>DISEASE_AIDS_Arteritis_Central_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020943 @@@HAND@@@.

citations.NLM: Yadav A, Betts MR, Collman RG. Statin modulation of monocyte phenotype and function: implications for HIV-1-associated neurocognitive disorders. J Neurovirol. 2016 Oct;22(5):584-596. PMID: 27021071
